backend/main.mo: Main actor defining types (Evidence, Appeal, WorkSession, LossProfile, Testimonial, PaymentConfig, etc.) and importing authorization mixins and access control modules for a gig-worker rights platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the PIX QR code display bug fix, listing affected files (PixQrCodeDisplay.tsx, qrCodeGenerator.ts) and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, hooks, components, and utilities, noting stubbed backend methods and type imports from backend-extended.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, and other UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Portuguese locale, PWA manifest, favicon references, theme color, and Google Fonts preconnect for Inter font family.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode for "ROTAS E DIREITOS" application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration using TanStack Router, defining all application routes (dashboard, evidence, appeals, payments, admin, etc.) with authentication-aware index component and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: An admin panel for moderating testimonials, allowing admins to approve or reject pending testimonials with status badges and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/MercadoPag: An empty file, likely a placeholder for MercadoPago payment integration setup documentation or UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/PagBankTra: A comprehensive form for configuring PagBank transparent checkout settings including token, email, public key, accepted payment types, installments, and return/webhook URLs.
frontend/src/components/admin/PagBankWeb: Displays and manages PagBank webhook and return URLs, with auto-generated webhook URL and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Authorization guard component that checks authentication and admin status, displaying appropriate loading states or access denied messages before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealEdi: An editor component for reviewing and modifying generated appeal text, with download and email sending capabilities.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealWiz: A wizard form for generating appeals by collecting platform, reason category, user explanation, and optional evidence IDs.
frontend/src/components/appeal/EvidenceP: A component that displays a list of evidence items from IndexedDB with checkboxes for selection, showing type badges, platform badges, and notes for each item.
frontend/src/components/appeal/SendViaEm: A button component that generates a mailto link for sending appeals via email, with an alert informing users they must manually attach evidence files.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header, logo, mobile menu toggle, navigation items for authenticated users, and conditional admin dashboard link.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: A component that blocks access to children content until the user authenticates via Internet Identity, displaying a login prompt with a customizable message.
frontend/src/components/collective/Colle: A filter component with three dropdowns for filtering collective reports by platform, region, and reason category.
A form component for submitting anonymous collective reports with platform, region, neighborhood, and reason fields, showing success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/collective/Platf: A card component displaying a bar chart of collective report counts grouped by platform using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/collective/Reaso: A card component displaying a pie chart showing the distribution of collective reports by reason category using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/collective/Trend: A card component displaying a line chart showing the trend of collective reports over time grouped by month using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/evidence/Evidenc: A filter component with two dropdowns for filtering evidence by type (selfie, screenshot, audio, video) and platform.
A toolbar component that appears when evidence items are selected, showing count and providing export and clear selection buttons.
A timeline component displaying evidence items from IndexedDB with filtering, multi-selection via checkboxes, and integration with the selection toolbar for bulk operations.

Form component for uploading evidence with tabs for real-time capture or file upload, supporting multiple evidence types (selfie, screenshot, audio, video) with metadata fields (platform, region, neighborhood, notes) and IndexedDB storage.
frontend/src/components/evidence/RealTim: Tabbed panel component for capturing photo, audio, or video evidence in real-time using custom hooks (useCamera, useMediaRecorder) with preview, recording controls, and duration display.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that toggles between login and logout states, handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProfile: Form component for entering and saving financial loss profile data including daily earnings, days per week, deactivation date, and platform selection with validation and API integration.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProject: Line chart component using Recharts to visualize projected earnings loss over 90 days based on a user's loss profile.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossReportA: Action buttons component for downloading or sharing generated loss reports as text files with clipboard and native share API support.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossResults: Dashboard cards displaying calculated weekly, monthly, and accumulated financial losses with icons and formatted currency values.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Carousel banner component showcasing platform features across five slides with navigation controls, auto-advance, and click-through to plans page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/market: Data file defining five banner slides with headlines, subheadlines, and image paths for desktop and mobile versions of the marketing carousel.
frontend/src/components/marketing/useMar: Custom React hook that manages carousel state for marketing banners with auto-advance, manual navigation, and pause/resume controls.
frontend/src/components/payments/PagBank: React component that displays a step-by-step guide for configuring PagBank payment integration, including account setup, API credentials, webhook configuration, and SSL/HTTPS information.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Reusable component that displays an alert when a payment provider is not configured, with role-based messaging and admin navigation for configuration.
Component that displays payment flow status (pending, completed, failed) with appropriate UI feedback, action buttons, and navigation options based on payment state.
frontend/src/components/payments/PixQrCo: Component that generates and displays a PIX QR code for payment, including the QR code image, PIX key, and copy-to-clipboard functionality for both key and payload.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to set up their profile with name (required) and email (optional) when no user profile exists.
frontend/src/components/sessions/WorkSes: Component for starting and ending work sessions with city selection, automatic weather sampling every 30 minutes during active sessions.
Component that displays a list of work sessions with timestamps, city, weather sample counts, and active session indicators, with navigation to session details.
Main component for work session management that renders a card with controls to start/stop sessions and displays a list of work sessions, managing active session state.
frontend/src/components/subscription/Fea: Access control component that checks user entitlement and displays a locked state with upgrade prompts when users lack required subscription (free or pro) to access features.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Sub: Dialog component for authenticated users to submit testimonials with form validation, character limits, success/error handling, and authentication checks via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/tes: Static testimonial data with six hardcoded testimonials from delivery workers, used as fallback when backend testimonials are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Displays a grid of testimonials from backend or fallback static data, with loading skeletons and a button to open the submit testimonial dialog.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustBadge: Displays three trust badges (Data Protection, Secure Payment, 100% Trustworthy) with icons in a horizontal flex layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin hooks for fetching all user access info and blocking/unblocking users, with mutations throwing not-yet-implemented errors for block operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPaymentConfig: Mutation hook for updating payment configuration (admin only) with error sanitization to prevent exposing sensitive backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppeals.ts: React Query hooks for appeal generation and retrieval that currently throw not-yet-implemented errors as backend methods are pending.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlockedAccountHelp: Custom hook managing user progress through blocked account help steps with localStorage persistence per principal, tracking completed steps and checklist items.
frontend/src/hooks/useCases.ts: Provides React Query hooks for managing legal cases, including fetching all cases, getting a case by ID, creating, updating, attaching evidence, and attaching appeals. All operations use local storage via casesStorage and invalidate queries on mutations.
Defines hooks for submitting and retrieving collective reports by platform, region, and neighborhood. Both hooks throw errors indicating the backend does not implement collective report functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Wraps useInternetIdentity to provide authentication status, principal ID, shortened ID, and logout functionality for the current user.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvidence.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, uploading, and deleting evidence with various metadata (type, platform, region, quality). All backend operations throw errors as evidence is stored client-side in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/hooks/useGatewayPayment.ts: Manages payment gateway flow state (idle, initiating, pending, completed, failed) with mutations to create payment sessions and check payment status, invalidating subscription queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageStyleVaria: Manages a homepage style variant (A, B, or C) persisted in localStorage with a toggle function to cycle through variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, identity state, and status tracking. Includes a provider component that wraps the app and manages AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend actor to check if the current caller has admin privileges, returning admin status, loading state, and any errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useLossProfile.ts: Provides hooks to get and set a user's loss profile. The get operation returns null as the backend method is not implemented; the set operation calls the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaRecorder.ts: Custom hook for recording audio or video using the MediaRecorder API, managing recording state (recording, paused, duration, errors) and providing start, stop, pause, resume, and cancel functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMercadoPagoPayment: File appears to be empty or contains no content.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagBankPayment.ts: Custom React hook managing PagBank payment flow state (idle, initiating, pending, completed, failed) with mutations for creating payment sessions and checking payment status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagBankReturnWebho: React Query hooks for fetching and updating PagBank return/webhook URL configuration via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagBankTransparent: React Query hooks for fetching and updating PagBank transparent checkout configuration via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicPaymentConfi: React Query hook that fetches public (non-sensitive) payment provider configuration with 30-second cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook for fetching reviso motivada message (backend method not yet implemented, returns placeholder).
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: React Query hooks for fetching subscription status and evaluating user entitlements based on subscription rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestimonials.ts: React Query hooks for managing testimonials: fetching approved/pending testimonials, submitting new testimonials, and updating testimonial status with error sanitization.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkSessions.ts: React Query hooks for work session management including logging sessions, ending sessions, and adding weather samples (some backend methods not yet implemented).
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a black background with orange/white color scheme, including dark mode and alternative style variants (teal and warm sunset).
frontend/src/lib/canisterConfig.ts: Utility functions to extract canister ID from environment variables or IC domain hostname, and generate webhook URLs for the backend canister.
frontend/src/lib/casesStorage.ts: LocalStorage-based CRUD operations for case management including creating cases, updating status, attaching evidence, generating appeals, and managing timeline events.
frontend/src/lib/collectiveOptions.ts: Defines region and neighborhood options for collective action forms, mapping regions (Fortaleza, Caucaia, Maracana√∫) to their respective neighborhoods.
frontend/src/lib/evidenceIndexedDb.ts: Manages IndexedDB storage for evidence media (images, audio, video) and metadata, providing hooks and functions to store/retrieve evidence with support for multiple media types.
frontend/src/lib/lossCalculations.ts: Calculates financial losses for deactivated drivers including weekly, monthly, accumulated, and projected losses based on daily earnings and deactivation date.
frontend/src/lib/mailto.ts: Generates mailto links for platform appeals and support emails, mapping platforms to their support email addresses.
Manages session storage for selected subscription plan during checkout flow.
frontend/src/lib/payments/gatewayErrorMe: Sanitizes generic payment gateway errors into user-friendly Portuguese messages, categorizing errors by type and indicating whether admin action is required.
frontend/src/lib/payments/pagbankErrorMe: Sanitizes PagBank-specific payment errors into user-friendly Portuguese messages, handling configuration, authentication, and payment processing errors.
frontend/src/lib/payments/paymentErrorMe: Centralized payment error sanitizer that maps backend errors to safe English user-facing messages with error type categorization and admin action flags.
frontend/src/lib/payments/pixPayload.ts: Generates valid PIX EMV QR code payloads following BR Code specification, including CRC16 checksum calculation and TLV formatting.
frontend/src/lib/payments/providerConfig: Manages payment provider selection (gateway or PagBank) in localStorage and determines active provider from public config with PagBank prioritized over gateway.
frontend/src/lib/payments/qrCodeGenerato: Dynamically loads the qrcodejs library from CDN and generates QR code data URLs client-side by rendering to a temporary DOM container and extracting the canvas or image data.
frontend/src/lib/pdfReport.ts: Generates plain-text loss reports for delivery drivers, calculating weekly, monthly, and accumulated earnings losses based on deactivation profiles.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/plans.ts: Defines subscription plan metadata (free 24h, pro monthly, pro annual) with pricing, features, and a helper to retrieve plans by ID.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/rules.ts: Evaluates subscription entitlement status (trial, pro, expired) and formats expiry dates for display.
frontend/src/lib/supportSummary.ts: Generates case summaries and mailto links for support emails, including case details, evidence count, and appeal status.
frontend/src/lib/templatesLibrary.ts: Provides a library of appeal and communication templates categorized by platform, reason, and type (appeals, rights, evidence guidelines).
frontend/src/lib/testimonials/testimonia: Sanitizes raw testimonial mutation errors into user-friendly English messages for authentication, authorization, and not-found scenarios.
frontend/src/lib/weatherClient.ts: Fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap API for Brazilian cities and maps conditions to backend WeatherCondition enum, with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/lib/zipExport.ts: Placeholder function for exporting evidence files as a ZIP archive; currently logs evidence IDs to console.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard with tabs for user management (block/unblock), payment configuration (gateway/PagBank), testimonial moderation, and PagBank setup guide.
frontend/src/pages/AppealGeneratorPage.t: Page for generating appeal letters using a wizard, evidence picker, and displaying/downloading/emailing the generated appeal text.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that handles payment initiation for subscription plans, supporting both Gateway and PagBank providers with PIX QR code display, status checking, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CollectiveInsightsPag: Displays anonymous aggregated community data about delivery worker deactivations with filters for platform, region, and reason, showing distribution charts and trends.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with navigation cards to key modules (evidence tracker, loss calculator, appeal generator, collective data) and quick access shortcuts to payments, profile, and quick search.
frontend/src/pages/DataPolicyPage.tsx: Static page displaying the data policy and LGPD compliance information, explaining data categories, legal bases, treatment purposes, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceDetailPage.ts: Detail view for a single evidence item, displaying metadata (type, platform, region, timestamp) and rendering the associated media (image, audio, or video) from IndexedDB.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceTrackerPage.t: Tabbed page with authentication gate for managing evidence uploads and work sessions, containing upload form, timeline view, and work sessions section.
frontend/src/pages/LossCalculatorPage.ts: Page for calculating financial losses from platform deactivation, featuring a profile form, results cards, projection chart, and report generation actions behind an authentication gate.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Displays available payment methods (PIX, Credit Card, Bank Slip) with icons and descriptions, includes a CTA to view plans and trust badges.
frontend/src/pages/PlansBillingPage.tsx: Shows subscription plans with pricing and features, displays current subscription status with expiry dates, and provides upgrade buttons to navigate to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PlansDashboardPage.ts: Dashboard for managing subscriptions showing current plan status, expiry information, and a comparison grid of all available plans with upgrade options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy in a scrollable card covering data collection, usage, storage on Internet Computer blockchain, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page with form to update name and email, displays Internet Identity Principal ID, and handles profile save mutations.
frontend/src/pages/PublicOverviewPage.ts: Public landing page showcasing app features (evidence tracker, loss calculator, resource generator, collective data), includes marketing banner, testimonials, and style variant toggle (A/B/C).
frontend/src/pages/QuickProcessLookupPag: React page component for searching and tracking administrative appeals and legal processes, currently showing a placeholder UI with a search form and future features list.
frontend/src/pages/WorkSessionDetailPage: React page component that displays detailed information about a work session including start/end times, location, duration, and weather conditions, with navigation back to the evidence list.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: TypeScript type definitions extending backend types with enums and interfaces for Region, EvidenceType, Evidence, Appeal, CollectiveReport, and PublicLossProfile that are missing from the backend interface.
frontend/src/types/case.ts: TypeScript type definitions for case management including Case, CaseEvidence, CaseAppeal, TimelineEvent, CaseStatus, and CreateCaseParams interfaces.
frontend/src/types/mercadopago.ts: Empty TypeScript file for MercadoPago payment integration types.
frontend/src/types/qrcode.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for QR code type definitions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings, typography and animation plugins, and custom utility classes.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking a fix request for PIX QR code display issue in checkout flow, with pending architecture requirements for component integration and payload generation verification.
